portfolio.title: Global Par-tea Website
portfolio.description:
Global Par-tea is a website that allows the user to enter in their name, which accent they would like it to be pronounced in, their preferred pronouns, and a small self-introduction.
Every entry is displayed in its own box and users can click each one to listen to the person's name pronunciation.
This website was created with CSS, JavaScript, and React for the frontend.The backend was developed with the Amazon Polly API, Python, and the Flask framework.
